Jack and Jill

Timeline of events:

  • Some water was needed.
  • Jack and Jill determined the hill had water at the top.
  • They located a bucket.
  • They went together up the hill to get the water.
  • Unfortunately Jack fell over en-route, hurting his head.
  • Apparently, Jill also fell down.

If you have time, you should read more about these characters on their Wikipedia entry.
